comments:
an NPE is thrown if I try to retrieve a field that does not exist on an IJavaObject, which is a legitimate call.

IJavaObject.getField(String, boolean) is spec'd to return null if no such field exists.

released a fix to JDIObjectValue.getField(). If the field doesn't exist we assumed it was in an enclosing class and attempted to find this$XXX regardless of whether there was an enclosing field or not.
